price: یقینا ته مړو ته اورول نه شې کولای او نه هغه کڼو ته خپل اوازرسولی شې چې شا اړوي تښتي.
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
